Perfect quality, A10/V10.

People, MKV, MP4, it doesn't matter!  It's just the container that the file is in, little more than a difference in extension, and absolutely nothing to do with the content inside of it.  If you have a program or device that doesn't work with MKV files, simply use YAMB (Google it) to export it to an MP4 file.  Takes 5 to 10 minutes for a typical 2 to 4GB 720P movie.  About twice as fast if you want to change an MP4 to an MKV file, in which case you use a program called MKV Merge.
